name: Coffee Turtle (Collin)
description:
Congratulations! You've just landed a highly competitive unpaid internship at Bunny Business, Inc. as the new Coffee Turtle. It's now your job to make sure that your boss gets his morning coffee before it gets cold. Easy, right? Just watch out for your clumsy colleagues as you climb the building to his office. These bunnies are in a hurry!

Controls: Use the left and right arrow keys to move. 

Hide behind furniture to avoid bumping into your colleagues!

I've been sick this week and wanted to make something short and silly to keep myself occupied. If you enjoy the game, please leave me a comment! I'm new to game development, so it means a lot hearing from the community.
